forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 11pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. South southeast wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
